Description: Rim sherd of large Chian pottery Ionian cup with everted rim; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; band of vertical tongues in added white above added red and white bands; exterior: lip glazed with trace of added red band; reserved at junction with body.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1911) (phase 2)
